Content: 13*p42970a01324*turn over      *(ii) describe the mechanism of the reaction between butane and bromine that forms the products given in the equation below.c4h10  +  br2  o  c4h9br  +  hbr   in your answer you should include    equations for each step of the mechanism (curly arrows are not required)    the name of each step occurring in the mechanism.(7)(total for question 20 = 21 marks)
